channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AR

item.title: Report E-2023110201
item.description:
Report E-2023110201

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-14T18:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-23
  • City: WEST MEMPHIS
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.

item.title: Report X-2023100572
item.description:
Report X-2023100572

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-28
  • City: MABELVALE
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Was loaded for delivery, driver coded a 10 because there was spillage from outer package. DescribePack: Upon QA inspection inner package (plastic pail) bottom was cracked DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: placed in hazmat damaged tote

item.title: Report X-2023100509
item.description:
Report X-2023100509

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-08T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-22
  • City: MABELVALE
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Noticed package was wet, got hazmat bag and put on gloves to inspect package. In the package there was a bottle with a missing cap. Found cap next to bottle. DescribePack: Bottle missing cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Place cap back on bottle.
